Name: Fruit Salad
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of fruit Salad chew.
Review: This variation on the Harvey Wallbanger tastes reminiscent of Fruit Salad 'penny' chews.
Nutrition: One serving of Fruit Salad contains 200 calories
